Description of incident: PerkinElmer, Inc notified employees of a data breach when a PerkinsElmer employee was a victim of a phishing scam and was sent an email that appeared to be from another PerkinsElmer employee requesting information on other employees. The information compromised included names, dates of birth, home addresses, Social Security numbers, salary information, titles and specific employee information.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-60521
